verses.text: \w The|strong="G3956"\w* former treatise \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w made|strong="G4160"\w*, \w O|strong="G5599"\w* \w Theophilus|strong="G2321"\w*, \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w began|strong="G0757"\w* \w to|strong="G0757"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G0757"\w* \w teach|strong="G1321"\w*,

\w Until|strong="G0891"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w on|strong="G4151"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w*, giving commandments \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* Ghost \w to|strong="G0891"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G3739"\w* \w had|strong="G3739"\w* \w chosen|strong="G1586"\w*, \w he|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G3739"\w* \w taken|strong="G0353"\w* \w up|strong="G0353"\w*.

\w To|strong="G3004"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* shewed \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w alive|strong="G2198"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* passion, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w proofs|strong="G5039"\w*, \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w appearing|strong="G3700"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w speaking|strong="G3004"\w* \w of|strong="G0932"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* \w of|strong="G0932"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* eating \w together|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G0575"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w commanded|strong="G3853"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w should|strong="G5563"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* depart \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w should|strong="G5563"\w* \w wait|strong="G4037"\w* \w for|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* (saith \w he|strong="G2532"\w*) \w by|strong="G0575"\w* \w my|strong="G0191"\w* mouth.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3303"\w* \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w be|strong="G3326"\w* \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* Ghost, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* hence.

\w They|strong="G0846"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G3778"\w* \w come|strong="G4905"\w* \w together|strong="G4905"\w*, \w asked|strong="G2065"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, wilt thou \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w* \w restore|strong="G0600"\w* again \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w It|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w times|strong="G2540"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* moments, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* hath \w put|strong="G5087"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* Ghost \w coming|strong="G1904"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w* unto \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w Judea|strong="G2449"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Samaria|strong="G4540"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* uttermost \w part|strong="G1473"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*, \w while|strong="G0846"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* looked \w on|strong="G0575"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w raised|strong="G1869"\w* \w up|strong="G1869"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G3004"\w* \w cloud|strong="G3507"\w* \w received|strong="G5274"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w out|strong="G0575"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w sight|strong="G0991"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w while|strong="G1722"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* beholding \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w going|strong="G4198"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w stood|strong="G3936"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w garments|strong="G2066"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: Ye \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1057"\w*, \w why|strong="G5101"\w* \w stand|strong="G2476"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w looking|strong="G0991"\w* \w up|strong="G0353"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*? \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G5101"\w* \w taken|strong="G0353"\w* \w up|strong="G0353"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w seen|strong="G0991"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w going|strong="G4198"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w returned|strong="G5290"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w mount|strong="G3735"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w Olivet|strong="G1638"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* nigh \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, within \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w sabbath|strong="G4521"\w* \w dayâ€™s|strong="G4521"\w* \w journey|strong="G3598"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w come|strong="G1525"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G0305"\w* \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w an|strong="G1510"\w* \w upper|strong="G5253"\w* \w room|strong="G5253"\w*, \w where|strong="G3757"\w* abode \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w James|strong="G2385"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Andrew|strong="G0406"\w*, \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Thomas|strong="G2381"\w*, \w Bartholomew|strong="G0918"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Matthew|strong="G3156"\w*, \w James|strong="G2385"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* Alpheus, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* Zelotes, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jude|strong="G2455"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* brother \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w James|strong="G2385"\w*.

\w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* persevering \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w one|strong="G3661"\w* \w mind|strong="G3661"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w prayer|strong="G4335"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w rising|strong="G0450"\w* \w up|strong="G0450"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: (\w now|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w number|strong="G3793"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w persons|strong="G3686"\w* \w together|strong="G1909"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w about|strong="G5613"\w* \w an|strong="G1510"\w* \w hundred|strong="G1540"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w twenty|strong="G1501"\w*:)

\w Men|strong="G0435"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* needs \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* Ghost spoke \w before|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G2424"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* leader \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w them|strong="G3739"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* apprehended \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* numbered \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G1510"\w* obtained \w part|strong="G1473"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w* hath possessed \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w field|strong="G5564"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w reward|strong="G3408"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w iniquity|strong="G0093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w being|strong="G1096"\w* hanged, \w burst|strong="G2997"\w* asunder \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w midst|strong="G3319"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* bowels gushed \w out|strong="G1537"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w known|strong="G1110"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="G2730"\w* \w of|strong="G0129"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*: \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w field|strong="G5564"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w in|strong="G2730"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* tongue, Haceldama, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* say, \w The|strong="G3956"\w* \w field|strong="G5564"\w* \w of|strong="G0129"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w book|strong="G0976"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w Psalms|strong="G5568"\w*: \w Let|strong="G1096"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* habitation \w become|strong="G1096"\w* \w desolate|strong="G2048"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G1096"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w none|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w dwell|strong="G2730"\w* therein. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* bishopric \w let|strong="G1096"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w take|strong="G2983"\w*.

Wherefore \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w these|strong="G3739"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* companied \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w came|strong="G1831"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w*,

\w Beginning|strong="G0757"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w baptism|strong="G0908"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* wherein \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G3739"\w* \w taken|strong="G1096"\w* \w up|strong="G0353"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* us, \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w must|strong="G3588"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w witness|strong="G3144"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* us \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G3739"\w* appointed \w two|strong="G1417"\w*, \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w*, \w called|strong="G2564"\w* Barsabas, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G3739"\w* surnamed \w Justus|strong="G2459"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Matthias|strong="G3159"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w praying|strong="G4336"\w*, \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: Thou, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* knowest \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2589"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G3956"\w*, shew \w whether|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* thou hast \w chosen|strong="G1586"\w*,

\w To|strong="G1519"\w* \w take|strong="G2983"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w apostleship|strong="G0651"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* hath \w by|strong="G0575"\w* transgression fallen, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G2983"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w lots|strong="G2819"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w lot|strong="G2819"\w* \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w Matthias|strong="G3159"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* numbered \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w eleven|strong="G1733"\w* \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*.
